<title level="1" right="Rules">[Sustaining Activations](/Rules.aspx?ID=692)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 533 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Some items, once activated, have effects that can be sustained if you concentrate on them. This works much like the [Sustain a Spell](/Actions.aspx?ID=73) action. If an item’s description states that you can sustain the effect, that effect lasts until the end of your turn in the round after you Activated the Item. You can use a Sustain an Activation action on that turn to extend the duration.

<document level="2" id="action-99" />
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Sustaining Activations
